title: RGT Cycling adds NFT prizes to virtual world racing, plus new handcycling category
content:
Blockchains and bikes are becoming a thing, and RGT Cycling is the latest to bring NFTs to the starting line, literally. Or, well, virtually. As part of their Echelon Racing League, which pits some of the top teams (like Rally Cycling, Canyon eSports, Tibco Silicon Valley Bank Pro Cycling, Butcherbox, and the USA Cycling National

The post RGT Cycling adds NFT prizes to virtual world racing, plus new handcycling category appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
